titleStmt.title: A paraphrasticall explication of the prophecie of Habakkuk, which is a prophecie that may supply us with fit matter of meditation for these times.
titleStmt.author: Stokes, David, 1591?-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to David Stokes by Wing.
"A contemporary note in the copy in the Lincoln's Inn Library is 'By Dr. Stokes, ut asseritur'"--Madan.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 8th 1645"; the second 6 im imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
